articles.title: Best Buy Black Friday sale is live from $19 — 27 deals I'm shopping on headphones, Switch games, OLED TVs and more - Tom's Guide
articles.description: Best Buy's top Black Friday deals on tech and appliances
articles.content: Black Friday deals have officially launched at Best Buy. Although the retail holiday itself is a few weeks out, there's no harm in getting your holiday shopping started early, especially if you want … [+527 chars]
